title: FS: T206 Demmitt St.L., T205 Wallace 1 line, Red Cross
author: Runscott

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Demmitt St.L., T205 Wallace 1 line, Red Cross
posts.post_content:
A bunch of rare to very tough T206's, plus a rare Red Cross Type 1.

The T205 Wallace has beautiful color and registration, and (don't slap me), is under graded in my opinion.  If it doesn't sell at this price, it will probably get cracked out and re-submitted.

Prices are by check or money order (add 3% for Paypal), shipped and insured.

  * T206 Magie Error SGC 10 - *SOLD*
  * T206 O'Hara St. Louis PSA 1 - *SOLD*
  * T206 Demmitt St. Louis PSA 1 - $970
  * T206 Kleinow PSA 6 - *SOLD*
  * T206 Broad Leaf 350 - Beck PSA 3 (MC) - *SOLD*
  * T206 Cycle 460 - Frank Smith/Chicago & Boston SGC 50 - *SOLD*
  * T205 Wallace No Cap, 1 line of stats - $900 FIRM
  * T215 Type 1 Red Cross Hughie Jennings, SGC 40 - $999 FIRM


Left-click image to see hi-res scan of front and back:

[URL="http://t206themonster.com/Cards/PT206-122bDemP1.jpeg"][IMG]http://t206themonster.com/Cards/Icons/iT206-Demmitt.png[/IMG][/URL]

[URL="http://t206themonster.com/Cards/PT206-249aKleP6.jpeg"][IMG]http://t206themonster.com/Cards/Icons/iT206-KleiBos.png[/IMG][/URL]

[URL="http://t206themonster.com/Cards/FORSALE/ST215-Jennings.jpeg"][IMG]http://t206themonster.com/publishImages/Page-TMisc~~element405.png[/IMG][/URL]

[URL="http://t206themonster.com/ST205-197aWal.jpeg"][IMG]http://t206themonster.com/iT205Wallace.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

Other available cards headed out soon, are shown here

[URL="http://runscott.homestead.com/Page-TMisc.html?_=1346529696749"]Pre-War HOF'ers & Stars for Sale at T206themonster.com[/URL]

and include:

All prices are Firm, as most will be sent in for grading (or re-grading) and I expect their value to go up.

  * 1915 Cracker Jack - Walter Johnson - $695
  * N162 Brouthers SGC Auth (trimmed left) - $480
  * 1933 Goudey Babe Ruth #53 (Yellow portrait), mark on back - $1,220
  * 1933 Goudey Gehrig #92, mark on back - $870
  * 1933 Goudey Gehrig #160, mark on back - $650

Added:

  * T206 Magie Error
  * T206 O'Hara St. Louis
  * T206 Demmitt St. Louis
  * T206 Cycle 460 Smith/Chicago & Boston
  * T206 BroadLeaf 350 Beck
  * T206 Kleinow Boston
Wish Mr. Ohara had showed up a month ago....good luck Scott great cards...
Hey Scott- Will take the Smith Boston/ Chicago SGC 50 Cycle 460. Thank you.
